name: Emma Byrnes
biography: Emma Byrmes worked as a web designer as well as studying interactive media at Victoria University. After graduating in 2001, Byrnes decided to make a shift from virtual to real environments. She now owns PLUMP Organic Grocery in Yarraville. For any future interactive projects Byrnes would like to draw inspiration from her current life situation - "a fruit and vegetable extravaganza, perhaps"?
